introduction: Naturopathic medicine is a holistic approach to healthcare that emphasizes the use of natural remedies to support the body's ability to heal itself. At VSR, we use the power of the five elements of nature - earth, water, sun, air and ether to provide care therapy for myriad health conditions.
benefits: Treats root causes, not just symptoms
process: Vangala Sanjeeva Reddy is a first-of-its-kind nature cure centre in Hyderabad, located amidst the tranquility of nature. We have left no stone unturned in ensuring that you get the best of ancient wisdom, nature and modern scientific knowledge. You'll experience the most comfortable accommodations, state-of-the-art amenities and many other luxury facilities.
duration: Programs range from 7-21 days depending on condition severity
additionalInfo: From the IRIS diagnosis to being the only hospital in Hyderabad that offers the Vichy Shower Massage, we are committed to providing the very best to you.

introduction: The gastrointestinal system is fundamental to overall health. Our comprehensive program addresses digestive disorders through natural therapies, dietary modifications, and detoxification techniques.
process: Our program includes specialized diet therapy, juice fasting, enemas, abdominal massages, and mud packs. We focus on cleansing and strengthening the digestive system while addressing the root cause of disorders.
duration: Recommended program: 14-21 days for optimal results
additionalInfo: A healthy gut is essential for immunity, mental health, and overall wellbeing. Our program not only treats symptoms but educates you on maintaining digestive health long-term.

introduction: Respiratory health is vital for overall wellbeing. Our respiratory program uses natural therapies to cleanse, strengthen, and heal the respiratory system, addressing conditions from asthma to chronic bronchitis.
process: The program includes steam inhalation, breathing exercises (pranayama), chest physiotherapy, mud packs, specialized diet, and various hydrotherapy treatments to open airways and reduce inflammation.
duration: Initial program: 14-21 days. Maintenance protocols provided for home practice
additionalInfo: Breathing exercises and lifestyle modifications learned during the program can be practiced at home for long-term respiratory health.

introduction: Our musculoskeletal program provides comprehensive natural treatment for joint, muscle, and bone conditions. We use therapies that reduce pain, improve mobility, and strengthen the musculoskeletal system.
process: Treatment includes therapeutic massages, hydrotherapy, mud therapy, physiotherapy, yoga, and specific exercises. We also address nutritional deficiencies and provide guidance on ergonomics and posture.
duration: Typical program: 14-21 days with follow-up exercises for home
additionalInfo: Our approach not only provides pain relief but also addresses underlying causes and teaches preventive strategies.

introduction: Hormonal imbalances affect multiple body systems. Our endocrinal program naturally regulates hormones through diet, lifestyle modifications, and specific therapies to restore balance.
process: The program includes specialized diet therapy, stress management, yoga, specific exercises, and natural supplements. We focus on supporting gland function and improving hormone sensitivity.
duration: Recommended: 21 days initial program with ongoing lifestyle support
additionalInfo: Hormonal balance is achieved through a comprehensive approach addressing diet, stress, sleep, and lifestyle factors.

introduction: Your skin reflects internal health. Our skin treatment program addresses conditions from within, using detoxification, dietary changes, and topical natural therapies for lasting results.
process: Treatment includes dietary modifications, detoxification, mud therapy, herbal applications, hydrotherapy, and specific nutritional support. We identify and eliminate triggers while promoting skin healing.
duration: Initial program: 14-21 days. Skin conditions may require extended care
additionalInfo: Healthy skin requires healthy internal systems. Our holistic approach ensures beautiful skin through overall health improvement.

introduction: Cardiovascular health is essential for longevity and quality of life. Our program strengthens heart health, improves circulation, and manages risk factors through natural methods.
process: The program includes heart-healthy diet, gentle exercises, stress management, yoga, hydrotherapy, and specific cardiovascular therapies. We monitor progress and adjust treatments accordingly.
duration: Recommended: 21 days with lifestyle modification guidance
additionalInfo: Prevention is key in cardiovascular health. Our program provides tools and knowledge for lifelong heart health.

introduction: Metabolic disorders like obesity and diabetes require comprehensive lifestyle changes. Our program addresses these conditions holistically through diet, exercise, and natural therapies.
process: The program includes customized diet plans, therapeutic fasting, exercise routines, yoga, stress management, and educational sessions on nutrition and lifestyle. Regular monitoring ensures safe and effective progress.
duration: Initial program: 21 days with extended support for sustained results
additionalInfo: Sustainable weight loss and diabetes management require permanent lifestyle changes. Our program equips you with knowledge and habits for long-term success.
